CustomField.description: The name of ‘Related Object’ associated with the ‘Record Type & Field’ record which will be any of the child objects of the Master object which needs to be masked/deleted
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name of ‘Related Object’ associated with the ‘Record Type & Field’ record which will be any of the child objects of the Master object which needs to be masked/deleted
CustomField.label: Related Object Name
